name: Mission Control (ttul008)
description:
You are in control of a few spaceship thrusters.  You only have seconds to manuver your craft into the right trajectory. 

Once the time is up, you are out of control.

Use arrows to activate Thrusters. 
Press R to restart current level.

There are currently 7 levels.

Credits:
Black hole image - The Event Horizon Telescope (EHT)
Asteroid image - NASA (Image Credit: NASA/JPL-Caltech/UCAL/MPS/DLR/IDA)

SFX: Me - making silly noises
Music: Soaring by Kevin MacLeod
Link: https://incompetech.filmmusic.io/song/4386-soaring
